titleInfo.title: Disambiguation of author addresses in bibliometric databases - technical report.

mods.abstract: This report has been generated from an internal documentation about the institutional disambiguation developed and processed by the Bibliometric Group of Bielefeld University (part of the [Institute for Interdisciplinary Studies of Science - I²SoS](http://www.uni-bielefeld.de/i2sos/bibliometrie/)) since 2008 in the context of the [German Competence Centre for Bibliometrics](http://www.bibliometrie.info/).

originInfo.publisher: Universität Bielefeld, Institute for Interdisciplinary Studies of Science (I²SoS)
